Linux: Bashrc

.bashrc dosyam

Son güncelleme: 2006.01.06 


#
#.bashrc
#

# Olmazsa olmaz
alias rm='rm -i'
alias cp='cp -i'
alias mv='mv -i'

# tin, haber gruplari
alias tin.anet='tin -A -r -G 300 -g news.anet.net.tr'
alias tin.tin='tin -r -G 300 -g news.tin.org'
alias tin.lapis='tin -r -G 300 -g news.linux-sevenler.org'

# Bu kadar vim kullan&#305;rsam olaca&#287;&#305; budur!
alias :wq='exit'

# Useful ones
alias ..='cd ..'
alias cd..='cd ..'
alias cls='clear'
alias h='history 50'


# ping
alias p='ping'
alias p.google='ping www.google.com'
alias p.kozgun.net='ping www.kozgun.net'
alias p.ofis='ping ofis'
alias p.ib1='ping ib1'

# tail
alias tailf.syslog='su -c "tail -f /var/log/syslog"'
alias tailf.messages='su -c "tail -f /var/log/messages"'
alias tailf.auth='su -c "tail -f /var/log/auth"'
alias tailf.apache.access='su -c "tail -f /var/log/apache/access.log"'
alias tailf.apache.error='su -c "tail -f /var/log/apache/error.log"'
alias tailf.qmail.smtpd='su -c "tail -f /var/log/qmail/qmail-smtpd/current"'
alias tailf.qmail.pop3d='su -c "tail -f /var/log/qmail/qmail-pop3d/current"'
alias tailf.qmail.send='su -c "tail -f /var/log/qmail/qmail-send/current"'
alias tailf.mail.log='su -c "tail -f /var/log/mail.log"'
alias tailf.mail.err='su -c "tail -f /var/log/mail.err"'
alias tailf.mail.info='su -c "tail -f /var/log/mail.info"'
alias tailf.clamav.clamd='su -c "tail -f /var/log/clamav/clamd.log"'
alias tailf.clamav.update='su -c "tail -f /var/log/clamav/clam-update.log"'


# less
alias less.syslog='su -c "less /var/log/syslog"'
alias less.messages='su -c "less /var/log/messages"'
alias less.auth='su -c "less /var/log/auth"'
alias less.apache.access='su -c "less /var/log/apache/access.log"'
alias less.apache.error='su -c "less /var/log/apache/error.log"'
alias less.qmail.smtpd='su -c "less /var/log/qmail/qmail-smtpd/current"'
alias less.qmail.pop3d='su -c "less /var/log/qmail/qmail-pop3d/current"'
alias less.qmail.send='su -c "less /var/log/qmail/qmail-send/current"'
alias less.mail.log='su -c "less /var/log/mail.log"'
alias less.mail.err='su -c "less /var/log/mail.err"'
alias less.mail.info='su -c "less /var/log/mail.info"'
alias less.clamav.clamd='su -c "less /var/log/clamav/clamd.log"'
alias less.clamav.update='su -c "less /var/log/clamav/clam-update.log"'

# ps
alias ps.efg='ps -ef |grep'
alias ps.auxg='ps -ef |grep'

# Flightgear
FG_ROOT=/usr/local/FlightGear
export FG_ROOT

# editor
EDITOR=vim
export EDITOR

# Fortune teller
if [ -x /usr/bin/fortune ] ; then
    echo
    /usr/bin/fortune
    echo
fi

# Change XKB on the fly
alias xkb_tr="setxkbmap -layout tr"
alias xkb_us="setxkbmap -layout us"
alias xkb_en="setxkbmap -layout en"

# mount
alias mount_dvd0="mount -t iso9660 /dev/dvd /media/dvd0"
alias mount_usb='mount /dev/sda1 /media/usb/'

# cd  
alias cd.Downloads="cd ~/Downloads"
alias cd.LinuxDocs="cd ~/LinuxDocs"
alias cd.Ebooks="cd ~/Ebooks"
alias cd.LinDepo="cd ~/LinDepo"
alias cd.LinDepo2="cd ~/LinDepo2"
alias cd.WinDepo2="cd ~/WinDepo2"

# Edit - vim 
alias ed.profile="vim ~/.profile"
alias ed.bashrc="vim ~/.bashrc"
alias ed.xinitrc="vim ~/.xinitrc"
alias ed.httpd.conf='su -c "vim /etc/apache/httpd.conf"'
alias ed.httpd.hosts='su -c "vim /etc/apache/httpd.hosts"'
alias ed.named.conf='su -c "vim /etc/named.conf"'
alias ed.badmailfrom='su -c "vim /var/qmail/control/badmailfrom"'
alias ed.smb.conf='su -c "vim /etc/samba/smb.conf"'
alias ed.programlar.txt='vim ~/.programlar.txt'

# Perl
alias perl_ins_mod="perl -MCPAN -e shell"

# Network tools
alias netstat.nlp="netstat -nlp"
alias f='finger'

# Dikkat!!! Asagidakiler 1 satir olacak.
PATH=$PATH:$HOME/bin
:/usr/local/OpenOffice/program
:/usr/local/share/mysql-administrator/bin
:$HOME/bin/network
:$HOME/bin/network/scp
:$HOME/bin/convert
:$HOME/bin/cross_office
:$HOME/bin/games
:$HOME/bin/rsync
:/usr/local/lib/java/bin
:/opt/netbeans/bin
:$HOME/bin/est
:/opt/java/bin
:/opt/java/jre/bin
:$HOME/bin/mysql
:/opt/acrobat5/bin
:$HOME/bin/image
:$HOME/bin/multimedia
:$HOME/bin/office
:$HOME/bin/watch
:$HOME/bin/security

# Java
CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:.
JAVA_HOME="/opt/java"
JAVAWS_HOME="/opt/java/jre/javaws"

# history dosyasi fazla abarmasin. 
HISTFILESIZE=30
HISTSIZE=30

# Charset for MIME headers.
MM_CHARSET=ISO-8859-9
export MM_CHARSET

# Encoding for SGML-DSSSL processing.
SP_ENCODING=ISO-8859-9
export SP_ENCODING


# enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases
if [ "$TERM" != "dumb" ]; then
    eval "`dircolors -b`"
    alias ls='ls --color=auto'
    #alias dir='ls --color=auto --format=vertical'
    #alias vdir='ls --color=auto --format=long'
fi

PS1="\[\033[1;30;47m[\033[1;30;47m\u@\h:\w\033[1;30;47m]\033[1;30;47m $\033[0;37;0m\] "
